answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Attached is a sample purchasing policy for Chatman County, NC. It includes responsibilities for purchasing agents, finance officers, and employees. It also has guides purchasing methods, special procurements, and building/equipment repair and summarizes formal and informal bid requirements and exceptions. Also, below are two links of more in depth policies, one from Grapevine,TX and Clarksville, TN:
http://www.grapevinetexas.gov/Portals/0/Purchasing/Purchasing%20Policies%20and%20Procedures/Master%20Manual.pdfhttp://
http://www.cityofclarksville.com/purchasing/pdf/PURCHASING%20POLICY-WEBSITE%20COPY.pdf
